parameters.name: NumberOfLoops
parameters.description: Number of loops on the face

title: IFace2.IGetLoops
description: Gets all of the loops on this face.

parameters.name: NumberOfLoops
parameters.description: Number of loops on the face

returns: in-process, unmanaged C++: Pointer to an array of all of the loops on the face (see Remarks ) VBA, VB.NET, C#, and C++/CLI: Not supported See In-process Methods for details about this type of method.
remarks:
Before calling this method, call
IFace2::GetLoopCount
to get NumberOfLoops.
If a face has one or more holes on it, then this method gets a loop for the face and a loop for every hole on the face.
